data.actual_result: The autocompletion list crushes/squeezes the textfield, and can even disappear if your keyboard is tall enough. If you can't reproduce, try with a taller keyboard (it really depends on the keyboard height)
data.expected_result: The mention autocompletion list pops up above chat textfield without altering its height
data.short_description: In Landscape mode, when including @ symbol, the mention autocompletion list will cause the chat textfield to squeeze, nay disappear, depending on your keyboard height
data.steps_to_repro: - Switch to Landscape mode - Focus the chat textfield  - Insert @ symbol. The keyboard must be open to do that
